list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a game in which players mark off numbers on cards as the numbers are drawn randomly by a caller, the winner being the first person to mark off five numbers in a row or another required pattern.
used to express satisfaction or surprise at a sudden positive event or outcome.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: bingo, she leapfrogged into a sales trainee position
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bingo, cô nhảy vào một vị trí thực tập sinh bán hàng
